revised_title: Ancient Roman Lead Inscriptions and Their Significance
tldr: The author, S. Kirkshaw, discovered two ancient lead pieces with inscriptions near Ripley. The inscriptions mention the Roman Emperor Domitian and his reign. The author discusses the possible origins and purpose of these lead pieces, as well as their relation to other similar discoveries in Cheshire. He leaves it to the learned members of the Royal Society to determine the original and design of these leads.
